Html:
What is with a nice line chart?
I think this is one of the basics :-)

Yes, you are right. It should be easy :-)

Unfortunately I was not able to implement a line chart in the new BETA release. But now after the BETA release with several improvements and bug fixes the line chart is on top of the TODO list :-)

Cheers,
Torsten

Great job Torsten and thanks for sharing this nice lib.

A line chart would be definitely helpful. I opened an issue so others can vote for it as well. See here.
Any news with this one? btw great work Torsten!

Hi all,

currently I'm heavily involved in my job and in a different software project and will find no time to create more charts in the next months (and I regret not being able to do it) :-(.
It would be great if some of you joins the project and improves the library.
I'm amazed that so many developers are using it and it would be great if the project can grow.

Please contact me so I can add you to the project.

Cheers,
Torsten
E-mail send, Torsten. Looking to help where I can and I have a patch waiting to go :)

Hi Guys,


Any updates on this? Would be really great!

Cheers,

MaC

Ohai o/

a line chart would be great!

How to use charts for Windows7, VS2010 and .NET 4.0? If click the solution MetroChart.sln then it doesn't response anything. Please help me.

Thanks in advance.
netlancer

any progress on the line chart yet?
i would love to see them included in the library.
amazing work, btw!

If anyone is interested I have started a new project with Torsten's approval that includes all his charts plus the addition of scatter / line charts. It also includes negative value support on the column chart. WPF Metro UI Charts
